CFB Data Betting Lines Examples

Saiem Gilani

cfbd_betting.Rmd

Load and Install Packages 

if (!requireNamespace('pacman', quietly = TRUE)){
  install.packages('pacman')
}
pacman::p_load(dplyr,tidyr, gt)
## Installing package into '/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library'
## (as 'lib' is unspecified)
## also installing the dependencies 'checkmate', 'commonmark', 'sass'
## 
## The downloaded binary packages are in
##  /var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpXGxMAe/downloaded_packages
## 
## gt installed
pacman::p_load_current_gh("saiemgilani/cfbfastR")

Get Betting information from games 

cfbd_betting_lines(year = 2018, week = 12, team = "Florida State")
##     game_id season season_type week     home_team home_conference home_score
## 1 401013175   2018     regular   12 Florida State             ACC         22
## 2 401013175   2018     regular   12 Florida State             ACC         22
## 3 401013175   2018     regular   12 Florida State             ACC         22
## 4 401013175   2018     regular   12 Florida State             ACC         22
##        away_team away_conference away_score     provider spread
## 1 Boston College             ACC         21    consensus      3
## 2 Boston College             ACC         21      Caesars      3
## 3 Boston College             ACC         21   numberfire    2.5
## 4 Boston College             ACC         21 teamrankings    2.5
##      formatted_spread over_under
## 1   Boston College -3       49.5
## 2   Boston College -3       48.5
## 3 Boston College -2.5         49
## 4 Boston College -2.5       47.5
# 7 OTs LSU at TAMU
cfbd_betting_lines(year = 2018, week = 13, team = "Texas A&M", conference = "SEC")
##     game_id season season_type week home_team home_conference home_score
## 1 401012356   2018     regular   13 Texas A&M             SEC         74
## 2 401012356   2018     regular   13 Texas A&M             SEC         74
## 3 401012356   2018     regular   13 Texas A&M             SEC         74
## 4 401012356   2018     regular   13 Texas A&M             SEC         74
##   away_team away_conference away_score     provider spread formatted_spread
## 1       LSU             SEC         72    consensus     -3     Texas A&M -3
## 2       LSU             SEC         72      Caesars     -3     Texas A&M -3
## 3       LSU             SEC         72   numberfire   <NA>        LSU -null
## 4       LSU             SEC         72 teamrankings     -3     Texas A&M -3
##   over_under
## 1       45.5
## 2       45.5
## 3       46.5
## 4       46.5
